content: **cozy crochet mug wrap pattern** keep your coffee warm and your hands comfortable with this beginner-friendly crochet mug cozy pattern designed for simplicity and style this practical wrap fits standard mugs and can be easily customized to match any décor or personal taste * skill level beginner * yarn type worsted weight size 4 * materials required 5mm crochet hook leftover yarn approx 16g needle scissors and stitch marker featuring a no-button slip-on design this pattern is quick to complete perfect for gifts craft fairs or personal projects with step-by-step instructions it s ideal for crocheters of all levels to create something both functional and beautiful make it your own with different colors textures or embellishments download the pattern today and start stitching ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/3d9rnwu ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/4ctmldv ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/pb07xcniiwy ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/rglamwsgx1i
